metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30592 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Out of bounds write in Tab Groups in Google Chrome prior to 92.0.4515.131allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto perform an out of bounds memory write via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
